    • Method Detail

      • makeGoogleURL

        public static java.net.URL makeGoogleURL(java.lang.String query)
                                  throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                         java.net.URISyntaxException
        Creates request URL for Google Books API. No OAuth required for this operation.
        Parameters:
        query: - search term
        Returns:
        properly formatted URL containing query terms
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.net.URISyntaxException

      • getJSONFromGoogle

        public static java.io.InputStream getJSONFromGoogle(java.net.URL url)
        Makes HTTP request and receives InputStream response in JSON format.
        Parameters:
        url: - URL formatted to make Google Books API request
        Returns:
        InputStream of JSON response

      • getImageURLfromJSON

        public static java.lang.String getImageURLfromJSON(JSONObject json)
        Parses JSON from Google Books to retrieve cover image url attribute.
        Parameters:
        json: - JSONObject from HTTP API request to Google Books
        Returns:
        String url

      • getDescriptionFromJSON

        public static java.lang.String getDescriptionFromJSON(JSONObject json)
        Parses JSON from Google Books to retrieve description attribute.
        Parameters:
        json: - JSONObject from HTTP API request to Google Books
        Returns:
        String description

      • getFirstBookFromJSONStream

        public static JSONObject getFirstBookFromJSONStream(java.io.InputStream in)
                                             throws JSONException
        Converts initial inputstream from Google Books API request to JSON, then extracts and returns first result. JSON architecture (of relevant items) is as follows: "items": JSONArray index 0: JSONObject "description": String "imageLinks": JSONObject "thumbnail": String
        Parameters:
        in: - InputStream from API request
        Returns:
        JSONObject of first item in search results
        Throws:
        JSONException - if results are not formatted as expected (i.e. books not found)

      • getImageFromURL

        public static Bitmap getImageFromURL(java.net.URL url)
        Fetches image at URL and returns decoded stream as bitmap
        Parameters:
        url: - location of image
        Returns:
        Bitmap, or null if no image found
